definitions.definition: A list of names , addresses etc, of specific classes of people or organizations , often in alphabetical order or in some classification .
examples: look up an address in the directory

definitions.definition: A structured listing of the names and characteristics of the files on a storage device .
A virtual container in a computer 's file system , in which files and other directories may be stored . The files and subdirectories in a directory are usually related .
A form of government with a collegial executive whose members jointly exercise power ; the executive of such a government.

main_definition: A list of names , addresses etc, of specific classes of people or organizations , often in alphabetical order or in some classification .
